summary.risk_overview: The repository lacks several fundamental security controls, increasing the risk of unauthorized access and data breaches. Immediate attention is required to address critical issues such as missing authentication and secrets management.

findings.title: Missing Authentication System
findings.evidence: No authentication mechanism found in the repository
findings.impact: Without authentication, unauthorized users can access the system, leading to potential data breaches.

steps: Implement an authentication system using OAuth2.
Integrate with a third-party identity provider.

findings.notes: Needs verification with the development team for any undocumented auth mechanisms.

findings.title: Hardcoded Secrets in Codebase
findings.impact: Exposure of secrets can lead to unauthorized access to external services.

steps: Use a secrets management tool like AWS Secrets Manager.

findings.notes: Ensure all team members are aware of secure secrets handling practices.

findings.title: Missing Rate Limiting
findings.evidence: No rate limiting implementation found in server configuration
findings.impact: Lack of rate limiting can lead to denial of service attacks.

steps: Configure limits based on user roles.

findings.notes: Consider different limits for different API endpoints.

findings.title: Outdated Dependencies
findings.impact: Outdated dependencies may contain known vulnerabilities.

steps: Update dependencies to the latest stable versions.
Run npm audit to identify vulnerabilities.

findings.notes: Regularly check for updates and apply them promptly.

findings.title: Missing Security Headers
findings.evidence: No security headers set in HTTP responses
findings.impact: Missing security headers can expose the application to various attacks like XSS and clickjacking.
findings.notes: Review all headers and ensure they are correctly configured.

No rate limiting implementation found in server configuration.
Hardcoded secrets found in the codebase.
No security headers set in HTTP responses.

checks_omitted: Cloud environment checks omitted due to local environment setup.
